pullRequest.title: Review Before Releasing Azure Cognitive Search
pullRequest.bodyText:
Changes based on review of #13028
This PR contains changes based on a review of the Azure Cognitive Search SDK. Notable changes are the following:

Added missing export from module-info.
Added missing package-info for com.azure.search.documents.models.
Added missing linting annotations.
Fixed places where Context wasn't being passed or retrieved from Reactor subscription context.
Cleaned up documentation.

commit.message: Added missing module-info export, added missing package-info, added missing linting annotations, and updated package-info Javadocs

nodes.bodyText: Why weren't these caught in checkstyle check before? Are we suppressing some valid checks?
